simple.gui.Button

    Package Description
    simple.gui  

    • Uses of Button in simple.gui

      Fields in simple.gui declared as Button 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Button ScrollBox.scrollDown
      Up/Down buttons to navigate through the ScrollBox.
      protected Button ScrollBox.scrollUp
      Up/Down buttons to navigate through the ScrollBox.
      Methods in simple.gui that return Button 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Button ScrollBox.getScrollDownButton()
      Returns the Button object for scrolling down.
      Button ScrollBox.getScrollUpButton()
      Returns the Button object for scrolling up.
